alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 9:49PM AKST until January 14 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION SNOW EVENT FOR THIS WEEKEND... .Snow has been ongoing across the northern panhandle since Friday night with snow accumulations of around 6 to 13 inches reported across the area as of Saturday morning. Snow has been very fluffy with snow ratios upwards of 40 to 50 to one in the northern inner channels. Snowfall rates expected to gradually increase in intensity through the weekend, and may become wetter and heavier as temperatures warm. Some areas near the outer coast may see rain start to mix in by Sun night and Monday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 7 to 12 inches. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snow rates will be Saturday night before snow starts to mix with rain Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
